metadata.title: CVE-2016-5014 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Moodle 2.x and 3.x, an unenrolled user still receives event monitornotifications even though they can no longer access the course.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
